title: Break the Ice
description: Marley Richardson was just a little girl when she first fell in love. But the boy who captured her heart at such a young age broke it years later. Ever since, it’s been a bitter battle between them.Mack Slater remembers the good old days… back when Marley used to smile at him. Now, all she does is glare and roll her eyes. And he has no idea why. Living in the same city, going to identical schools, Marley and Mack have grown up sharing a group of friends. When their pals plan a trip to the snowy, rugged mountains of Utah for some winter fun, the duo doesn’t hesitate to join. But the rest of the crew never shows up. Mack and Marley aren’t sure they’ll survive being in close quarters for two weeks. But if the pair are going to warm up to each other again, one of them will have to break the ice.
author: A.K. Evans
